contest-event.event-date:
June 20, 1891 D Hoyland Contest
Hoyland Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
hoyland-contest
None
Linda di Chamounix [arr. Godfrey]
Hoyland Best trombone - Glossop Old. Promoted by Wharncliffe Silkstone band. Brass Band News Septemer 1894 states conductor of Glossop Old was Charles Hall, which seems likely as Owen is also shown as conducting at both Southport and Hardraw Scar on this date. 12 bands entered, 11 bands competed.
Dec. 2, 2017, 2:57 p.m. Nov. 9, 2019, 1:06 p.m.
1 Glossop Old Band Alexander Owen
2 Rotherham Temperance Fenton Renshaw
3 Stocksbridge Works Charles Marsden
4 Dewsbury Temperance H. Teale
5 Thurlstone Brass Band Charles Marsden
Unknown Result Woodhouse Perseverance Fenton Renshaw
